name: Bella Umbria
overview:
Bella Umbria is a tourist portal with complete information about Umbria born with the aim of promoting and developing tourism resources of the area.

HISTORY The website Bellaumbria.net has been initially launched on June 1999 as a project of Green Consulting S.r.l, a local software company operating in the area of tourism web marketing.

In 1999, 2000, 2001, 2002, 2005 and 2006, ww.bellaumbria.net was awarded among the top 20 best projects in Italy, in the category Travel and Tourism Award by “IlSole24Ore.”

On June 2012 was launched the latest version of the website with new sections dedicated to travel users relating to: itineraries, travel packages, excellences of the territory, Point of Interests, events and much more informations about Umbria Region.

CONTENTS Bellaumbria.net provides complete informations in 5 languages ​​(Italian, English, French, German and Spanish) to tourists who want to visit Umbria. On the website is possible find helpful informations for the stay, travel itineraries and tourist guides. Bella Umbria also provides a booking service of hotels, farm holidays, country houses and b&b.
